text: 10.34 Mat 6.20, 19.21, 19.29, Luk 12.38, Apo 5.41, Plp 1.7, Jem 1.2 Nɨbi nepek, tap yɨbɨl nɨbi ak God man ne alaŋ mɨdɨl, anɨb okok pelpel yenɨgab. Anɨb ak binɨb apɨl tap nɨbop dad okok nɨb okok nɨb gelɨgɨpal ak, ak tap yokɨp agɨl gos awl ma nɨgem nɨbop tep golɨgup. Pen binɨb nɨbi ogɨnap nag lak okok, kɨlop yɨmug nɨŋɨd dɨtep gelɨgɨpɨm.
